Q_NAME: Area of a Rectangle using Copy Constructor
Q_DESC:
Design a class rectangle with length and breadth as members, constructor, parameterized constructor, copy constructor, calcarea() and displayarea() as member functions. 

Create three objects r1, r2 and r3. 

Read length and breadth as input from user and pass them to r2 using parameterized constructor. 

Assign r2 to r3 using copy constructor. 

Calculate and display the area of a rectangle using both r1, r2 and r3
